content:
cds-hooks-bot opened Issue #263

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 57

Submitted by @bvdh from Philips Healthcare

Chapter: CDS Services
Section: CDS Service Response - Suggestion - Action
Type: A-Q :question:
In Person Requested? Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Existing Wording:

In activities like medication-prescribe where only one "content" resource is ever relevant, this field may be omitted.

Comment:
Is this generic behavior is hook specific? If the latter, include in hook specification.

## Triage Information

Triage Notes:
Reviewed with Bas

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Proposed Disposition Comment:
We will move the example documentation around the resource field outside of the table in an effort to clarify that the behavior described here is applicable to all hooks

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot edited Issue #263

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #263

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Block Vote (5-30-2018)

Meeting notes: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=File:2018-05-30_CDS_WG_Call_Minutes.docx

Julia Skapik moved the following disposition, seconded by @brynrhodes.

Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Disposition Comment:
We will move the example documentation around the resource field outside of the table in an effort to clarify that the behavior described here is applicable to all hooks

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
